definition: to become wider or larger in scope
details:
verb
- to become wider or larger in scope
= example: to become wider or larger in scope
- to make something wider or larger in scope
= example: to make something wider or larger in scope
- to vary in order to spread risk or to expand
= example: to vary in order to spread risk or to expand
= synonyms: diversify, branch out
- to extend in scope or range or area
= example: to extend in scope or range or area
= synonyms: widen
